item.title: ‘The Devil Wears Prada 2’ Set Photos: Anne Hathaway Is All Smiles Filming Sequel and Wearing Bold Fashion
item.description: Anne Hathaway is showing off big smiles and bold new fashion choices on the set of “The Devil Wears Prada 2,” the long-awaited sequel which is now filming on the streets of New York City.

item.title: Anne Hathaway Shares First Look at ‘The Devil Wears Prada 2’
item.description: “Andy Sachs 2025,” the actress teased as she shared a photo of herself in character on the set of the upcoming sequel.
